resources.string: Let\'s start with your birth date
You are going to DIE one day,\nand you have limited time to live\n ONE LIFE
This app aims to help you realise & manage TIME more effectively
Ever thought about death?\nAt what age would you like to die?

Sleep plays a crucial role in optimal day-to-day functioning. A healthy amount of sleep for an adult is 8 to 9 hours.
At what time do you end your day and go to sleep?
You cannot enter time post midnight
